title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles that focus on evaluating large language models (LLMs) in the context of low-resource languages

**"Benchmarking Multilingual Models for Low-Resource Languages"**

title: **"Data Augmentation Techniques for Low-Resource Language Evaluation"**

title: **"The Role of Synthetic Data in Evaluating LLMs for Low-Resource Languages"**

container-title: **"Assessing the Performance of LLMs on Low-Resource Language Benchmarks"** - Language Resources and Evaluation Conference (LREC

title: **"Evaluating Zero-Shot and Few-Shot Learning in Low-Resource Languages"**
**"Adapting Pretrained Language Models to Low-Resource Languages: Evaluation Frameworks"**
**"Challenges in Evaluating Multilingual Models for Low-Resource Languages"**
**"Evaluation Metrics for Low-Resource Language Models: A Critical Review"**

These articles cover a range of topics from evaluation frameworks, data augmentation, transfer learning, and ethical considerations to the specific challenges posed by low-resource languages in the context of large language models
